source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
ATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
169 
I
nterpretation of umbilical artery Doppler (resistance index) 
Manage the client according to the instructions from the high-risk clinic. If there are no instructions with the Doppler 
results, the suggested management is as follows: 
• Resistance Index (RI) < 75th centile - normal. Repeat only if the clinical condition changes
• RI 75th -95th centile: repeat the Doppler after two weeks (patient preferably needs to be managed at a high risk
c
linic)
•
